import React, { useState } from "react"; import Favicon from "react-favicon"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ImageCarousel from "../Component/ImageCarousel/ImageCarousel"; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Header from "../Component/Header/Header"; import Footer from "../Component/Footer/Footer"; import "../AccountsAsset/form.css"; export default function SignUp(props) { let web = props.web.web; let web2 = props.web; let savedSite = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("site")) ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("site")) : []; return (
